text: The Cost of Living () is a 2003 French comedy film directed by Philippe Le Guay. == Cast == * Fabrice Luchini - Brett * Vincent Lindon - Coway * Camille Japy - Milène * Géraldine Pailhas - Helena * Isild Le Besco - Laurence * Lorànt Deutsch - Patrick * Claude Rich - Maurice * Bernard Bloch - Richet * Catherine Hosmalin - Karine == External links == * ==References== Category:2003 comedy films Category:French films Category:Films set in Lyon Category:French comedy films
title: The Cost of Living (2003 film)
